component.name: FileBot
component.summary: The ultimate TV and Movie Renamer

description.p: FileBot is the ultimate tool for renaming and organizing your movies, TV shows and Anime. Match and rename media files against online databases, download artwork and cover images, fetch subtitles, write metadata, and more, all at once in matter of seconds. It's smart and just works.
NOTE: This application is not verified by, affiliated with, or supported by Point Planck Limited.
